author: yhemanth
msg: HADOOP-6184. Provide an API to dump Configuration in a JSON format. Contributed by V.V.Chaitanya Krishna.

author: ddas
msg: MAPREDUCE-807. Handles the AccessControlException during the deletion of mapred.system.dir in the JobTracker. The JobTracker will bail out if it encounters such an exception. Contributed by Amar Kamat.
